text: Sheikh Nasser Bin Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Sabah (; 27 April 1948 â€“ 20 December 2020) was a Kuwaiti royal and politician. He was the First Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Defense of Kuwait from 2017 until 2019. Nasser was the oldest son of Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah. He was born in Kuwait City. Nasser died on 20 December 2020, aged 72.Sheikh Nasser Sabah Al Ahmed, former Kuwaiti Minister of Defence, dies at 72 He died two months after his father's death in September. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Kuwaiti people Category:Princes and princesses
title: Nasser Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Sabah
